titles.title: Providing for consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 35) making further continuing appropriations for fiscal year 2015, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 114-31, by Mr. Sessions.

Rule provides for consideration of H.J. Res. 35 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit. Measure will be considered read. Bill is closed to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 12.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 129.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 240 - 183 (Roll no. 100).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 240 - 183 (Roll no. 101).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 2/26/2015--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 35) making further continuing appropriations for fiscal year 2015.
